thread.title: Celtics' Josh Minott: Underwhelms in opening loss - CBS Sports
thread.title_full: Celtics' Josh Minott: Underwhelms in opening loss - CBS Sports

author: RotoWire Staff
title: Celtics' Josh Minott: Underwhelms in opening loss - CBS Sports
text:
1 min read Join the Conversation comments Now Playing Share Share Video Link copied! Minott chipped in two points (1-1 FG), two rebounds and two assists in 14 minutes during Wednesday's 117-116 loss to Philadelphia.
Minott played just 14 minutes, somewhat of a letdown following a strong preseason. While there were certainly no guarantees when it what Minott's role might look like, the hope was that he could crack 20 minutes. Seen as a potential flyer, managers could give him another game or two before deciding whether to part ways with him.
